item.title: NO_PUBKEY when running sudo apt-get update
item.description: I’ve tried a lot of solutions on the internet, but none of them worked for me. So I’m writing this post to help others who are having the same problem. Btw, this is my first post! What did I do? I wanted to update my Ubuntu 18.04 droplet on DigitalOcean, so I ran sudo apt-get update and the result I got was: root@ubuntu:~# sudo apt-get update Hit:1 https://repos.insights.digitalocean.com/apt/do-agent main InRelease Get:2 http://mirrors.
